actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years any individual may serve as a Federal judge or magistrate.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits any person from holding judicial office under the United States for more than eight years. Applies such limitation to persons appointed after the date of ratification.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years any individual may serve as a Federal judge or magistrate.
